Don’t forget to enter promo code LOGITECHFIVE during checkout to see the discounted price. This is one of the more popular keyboards in Logitech’s MX lineup, and it rarely gets any discounts to drop from its $130 usual price. It’s currently fetching its full price at Amazon, where it has never dropped below the $96 mark. Today’s deal at Woot – when paired with the promo code – shaves an additional $1 off to mark one of the best prices we have tracked for it. This is the lowest price we have seen this keyboard fetch to date outside a brief drop at Walmart that had it down at $80, and you can learn more about it below.

items.summary:
EcoFlow Solar Charging Power Hat

Buy for $79 (Reg. $129)

What we love

Folks who love the great outdoors will find solid power support to keep their phone and other essential personal devices with this EcoFlow Power Hat. It comes lined with solar paneling (as well as IP65 waterproof and dustproof ratings) and provides up to 12W charging speeds through its USB-C and USB-A ports, with the brand claiming it can recharge a phone in about three to four hours. You can wear it while hiking and during other activities, or even lay it down while doing other things, like on a chair to charge at locations like the beach, and more.

items.title: EcoFlow’s 6.1kWh DELTA Pro Ultra station + smart home panel 2 and FREE trolley at exclusive new $4,319 low ($3,479 off)

Update 2/5: Not only is this exclusive deal still live for an unknown amount of time longer, but the savings have increased to $3,479, landing this bundle at a new all-time low of $4,319.10 shipped, after using the code below.

We’ve secured quite the exclusive deal from Wellbots to keep your home running during power outages, with folks able to pick up the EcoFlow DELTA Pro Ultra Portable Power Station with a Smart Home Panel 2 and a FREE trolley at $4,409.10 shipped, after using the exclusive code 9TO5DPUJAN at checkout. This bundle (without the trolley) starts from a $7,997 full price tag, both here and directly from the brand, while at Amazon it’s priced a little lower at $7,499. The discounts we’ve seen over the last year have mostly kept the costs down between $5,599 and $4,999, though it did go as low as $4,699 – but again, this is without the trolley, which only occasionally gets included for free during some direct sales. While these exclusive savings last, you’ll be getting a larger-than-ever $3,090 cut from the going rate (not counting the FREE trolley that is valued at $299), giving you a total $3,389 savings and a new all-time low price to bolster your home support with.
